shows.title: Fantastic Negrito
shows.desc: Widely reviewed as one of the most electrifying performers at this year’s Glastonbury Festival, Fantastic Negrito comes to us fresh from winning a Grammy’s for the best contemporary blues album this year. His life story reads like the script of a Hollywoood blockbuster, but it’s his music that speaks most powerfully. He is a simply irresistible performer – a force of nature.

shows.title: Fantastic Negrito
shows.desc: Rustling something sumptuous up from oatmeal, fruit and cinnamon (among other things), the Grammy-award winning rejuvenated bluesman Fantastic Negrito cooks up a storm at The Table before headlining the Glade mainstage tonight! Expect Stateside culinary genius from a mercurial performer.
